name: Sharpshooter's Oath
description: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

passiveDescription.0: Increases DMG against weak spots by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Increases DMG against weak spots by <cryo>30%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Increases DMG against weak spots by <cryo>36%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Increases DMG against weak spots by <cryo>42%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases DMG against weak spots by <cryo>48%</cryo>.
